00010 #define NSIINT 3 
00011 #define NSIFLO 0
00012 #define NSIDBL 0
00013 
00014 
00015 #define CASSETTESHIFT 24
00016 #define ICOORDSHIFT 16
00017 #define JCOORDSHIFT 8
00018 #define KCOORDSHIFT 0
00019

00032 class SiPMMappingHcal : public LCFixedObject<NSIINT,NSIFLO,NSIDBL> {
00033   
00034 public: 
00035   
00038   SiPMMappingHcal(int sipmID, int cassetteID, int icoord, int jcoord , int kcoord) {
00039 
00040     int cellID = (cassetteID << CASSETTESHIFT ) | (icoord << ICOORDSHIFT) | (jcoord << JCOORDSHIFT) | (kcoord << KCOORDSHIFT) ;
00041 
00042     obj()->setIntVal( 0 , sipmID  ) ;
00043     obj()->setIntVal( 1 , cassetteID  ) ;
00044     obj()->setIntVal( 2 , cellID  ) ;
00045   }
00046 
00049   SiPMMappingHcal       (LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<NSIINT,NSIFLO,NSIDBL>(obj) { } 
00050 
00052   virtual ~SiPMMappingHcal      () { /* no op*/  }
00053   
00054 
00057   int getSiPMID()   { return obj()->getIntVal(0) ;  } 
00058   int getcassetteID()   { return obj()->getIntVal(1) ;  } 
00059   int getExCellID()   { return obj()->getIntVal(2);  } 
00060   int getCellID()   { return (obj()->getIntVal(2) & 0x00ffffff);  } 
00061 
00064   short getCellIndex(std::string);   
00065   void print(  std::ostream& os , std::string) ;
00066   
00067 
00068   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00069

00071     return"SiPM_MappingHcal" ;
00072   } 
00073   
00074   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00075     return "i:SiPMID,i:cassetteID,i:cellID" ;
00076   }
